name: Amaze (itch) (Ezlo)
description:
Find your way through a procedurally generated maze, collecting all eight coins in the process to open the final gate.

Features

  • Selfmade C++/DirectX12 engine
  • Unlimited challenge due to procedurally generated mazes with three difficulty settings
  • Nice 3D fantasy graphics
  • Relaxing soundtrack
  • Challenge friends by setting the same maze seed in the main menu and comparing the finishing times
  • Optional indicator that leads the way to the closest objective
  • Some physics fun at the beginning and the end of the maze

Controls

Keyboard:

  • WASD to move
  • Shift to sprint
  • W/S in the main menu
  • Space to confirm

Controller:

  • Left stick to move
  • Right trigger to sprint
  • Dpad Up/Down in the main menu
  • A to confirm

Launch the game using "amaze_launcher.exe" in order to change the game settings!
